situation: M was transitioning from the playground to the classroom but abruptly stopped at the classroom door and refused to enter.
action: The teacher aide initially ignored M's refusal to move, hoping he would eventually follow the class. M remained outside, increasing his distress and ultimately missing out on class activities.
effect: M was left anxious and isolated as he missed important instructions and activities of the day.
topic: Transition Difficulties - Moving between different activities or spaces
